author: Melissa Fortier "Melis22"

review: This device gets 3 stars, not because there is anything wrong with it but because it's just not needed if you have smart devices. Most of my devices (blue ray, TV, etc) are smart devices and have apps like Netflex, Amazon, etc. built into the device. You really don't need this device if you have that.The only thing this gives you extra is if you have a lot of Apple Products at home (iphone, ipad), etc. is a convenient way to mirror your device to the TV. That was the main reason I bought this. My daughter has an iphone (I personally don't like Apple products because I think they are overpriced) and she wanted to mirror the phone on the TV. I ended up laying $100 for this which is way too much. Apple did drop the price down to $69 because they realize this just isn't too attractive other than that capability. You can get the same from your smart devices, roku, or chrome cast for less.
